Package com.vserdiuk.casestudy.mapper

Class ProductMapper

java.lang.Object
com.vserdiuk.casestudy.mapper.ProductMapper
public class ProductMapper extends Object
Utility class for mapping between Product entities and DTOs.

  • Method Details

    • toDTO

      public static ProductDTO toDTO(Product product)
      Converts a Product entity to a ProductDTO.

      This method maps the properties of a Product entity (id, name, price, and stock quantity) to a ProductDTO using the builder pattern. If the input product is null, the method returns null.

      Parameters:
      product - the Product entity to be converted
      Returns:
      a ProductDTO containing the mapped properties, or null if the input is null

    • toEntity

      public static Product toEntity(CreateProductDTO dto)
      Converts a CreateProductDTO to a Product entity.

      This method maps the properties of a CreateProductDTO (name, price, and stock quantity) to a Product entity using the builder pattern. If the input dto is null, the method returns null.

      Parameters:
      dto - the CreateProductDTO to be converted
      Returns:
      a Product entity containing the mapped properties, or null if the input is null
